mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.ACODE, ADEPARTLOC, AARIVELOC, AGOTIME, AGO_ARRIVETIME, ACOME_DEPARTTIME, ACOME_ARRIVETIME, APRICE FROM ASCD A, AIR_RESERVE R WHERE A.ACODE=R.ACODE AND (AGODATE=#{agodate} AND ACOMEDATE=#{acomedate} AND ADEPARTLOC LIKE '%'||#{adepartloc}||'%' AND AARIVELOC LIKE '%'||#{aariveloc}||'%') AND A.ACODE NOT IN (SELECT AR.ACODE FROM AIR_RESERVE AR, ASCD A WHERE A.ACODE=AR.ACODE AND (AGODATE=#{agodate} AND ACOMEDATE=#{acomedate} AND ADEPARTLOC LIKE '%'||#{adepartloc}||'%' AND AARIVELOC LIKE '%'||#{aariveloc}||'%') GROUP BY AR.ACODE HAVING COUNT(SEATID) >= 20) OR A.ACODE IN (SELECT DISTINCT ACODE FROM ASCD WHERE (ACODE, AGOTIME, ACOME_DEPARTTIME) NOT IN (SELECT S.ACODE, S.AGOTIME, S.ACOME_DEPARTTIME FROM ASCD S, AIR_RESERVE R WHERE S.ACODE=R.ACODE AND AGODATE=#{agodate} AND ACOMEDATE=#{acomedate} AND ADEPARTLOC LIKE '%'||#{adepartloc}||'%' AND AARIVELOC LIKE '%'||#{aariveloc}||'%' ))AND ADEPARTLOC LIKE '%'||#{adepartloc}||'%' AND AARIVELOC LIKE '%'||#{aariveloc}||'%' ORDER BY A.ACODE
SELECT * FROM ASCD A , AIR_RESERVE R WHERE A.ACODE=R.ACODE AND A.ACODE=#{acode}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM ASCD ORDER BY ACODE) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE ASCD SET AGOTIME=#{agotime},AGO_ARRIVETIME=#{ago_arrivetime},ACOME_DEPARTTIME=#{acome_departtime},ACOME_ARRIVETIME=#{acome_arrivetime}, APRICE=#{aprice} WHERE ACODE=#{acode}
mapper.select: SELECT SEATID FROM AIR_RESERVE WHERE ACODE=#{acode} AND AGODATE=#{agodate} AND ACOMEDATE=#{acomedate}
SELECT * FROM AIR_RESERVE AR, ASCD A WHERE MID=#{mid} AND AR.ACODE = A.ACODE ORDER BY AGODATE,AGOTIME
